issue.title: [C++] Add Result<T> to APIs to core vector structures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Buffers, Array builders (anythings in the parent directory src/arrow root directory)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7232?focusedCommentId=17394151) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
This is pretty much done, apart from a couple internal APIs.
